1 00110000010100001001000001110011          csrw    mtvec, x1
2 00000000000000000000000001110011          ecall
3 01010101010101010101001100110111          lui     x6, 0x55555
4 01010101010101010101001110110111          lui     x7, 0x55555
5 00000000000100000000000001110011          ebreak
1024 00000001100000000011000100000011       ld      x2, 0x200
1025 00110100001000000001000101110011       csrr    x2, mcause
1026 00110100000100000001000111110011       csrr    x3, mepc
1027 00000000010000011000001000010011		addi    x4, x3, 4
1028 00110100000100100001000001110011       csrw    mepc, x4
1029 00110000001000000000000001110011       mret
